title: Ticket #4241: condor_q and condor_status should summarize by default
description:
In large pools, the output of condor_status and condor_q is not very useful, there is just too much detail. It should be possible to get at these details, but they should not be the default output. Instead the default output should be a digest or summary of the results.

For condor_q, perhaps one line of output per autocluster. For condor_status, one line of output per machine, or per machine 'autocluster'

This ticket is intended to contain the overall design and thoughts, other tickets will contain the actual commits in support of the goal of this ticket.
